group_1.narration: "I promised Iroha and the others that after@the four of them were gone and@our daily lives started to return to normal,@I would deliver the items they entrusted@me with to each of their families."
"So, I went to see Hiiragi-san's mother first."

group_1.textRight: I made you wait, didn't I?@I'm sorry about that.

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm sorry for calling you when@you're so busy.

group_1.textRight: It's fine.
...When someone says they have something@to discuss about Nemu,
I would clear my schedule no matter@what work I have.
Before Nemu disappeared, I had heard@about Magical Girls.
But, you know, it all seemed so unreal.
Isn't this just like one of that girl's@made-up stories?
That's why I didn't believe it.
...I couldn't bring myself to believe her.
...Even after Nemu disappeared, I still@couldn't believe it.
But after speaking with Satomi-san's@father and uncle,
little by little, I began to accept it, and only@then did it start to feel real...
...I'm a fool, aren't I?
It's only now, after reaching this point,@that I can regret it...

group_1.textLeft: ...There are many things we only realize@after losing something precious...

group_1.textRight: You don't need to comfort me.
I know that I was a bad mother.
I wanted to do something for her in the end,
but there's nothing more I can do for her now...
I'm sure Nemu has more than given up on@me by now, probably exasperated with me...

group_1.textLeft: ...There is still something you can do for Nemu-san...

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: This is why I called you today.
I would like to give you something that@Nemu-san entrusted to me.

group_1.textRight: ...?@[chara:800600:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]A stuffed polar bear...?
Hmm... Did I buy it while Nemu was in the hospital?
She was hospitalized for a long time, and I brought@her many things, so I'm not sure...
I wonder if this was the stuffed animal@Nemu liked the most.

group_1.textLeft: ...Nemu-san said this was the first@stuffed animal
she received from her mother while@she was hospitalized.
Even when her parents were busy and@couldn't visit her,
with this plushie, she was able to feel@connected to her family
"I want my mother to hold this polar bear@and think of it as if it were me,"

group_1.textRight: Now that I think about it...
When she was in the hospital, Nemu was a child@who never made selfish requests.
...This request is from a girl like her.
I will cherish this stuffed animal for@the rest of my life.
